channel.title: Public RPC Endpoints on Pocket Network
channel.description: Recent content in Public RPC Endpoints on Pocket Network

item.title: Avalanche \(AVAX\)
item.description: {% embed url=“https://youtu.be/9SNGe2tfmmw" %} We have created a public Avalanche RPC endpoint with up to 1M requests per day to give people who use Metamask the opportunity to connect to Pocket’s decentralized, censorship-resistant infra. To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for Avalanche C-Chain, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write Avalanche Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://avax-mainnet.

item.title: Binance Smart Chain \(BSC\)
item.description: {% embed url=“https://youtu.be/fLTvtBtOEg0" %} We have created a public BSC RPC endpoint with up to 1M requests per day to give people who use Metamask the opportunity to connect to Pocket’s decentralized, censorship-resistant infra. To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for BSC, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write BSC Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URLhttps://bsc-mainnet.

item.title: Connecting MetaMask to DFK Chain
item.description: For those who play Defi Kingdoms, you can use Pocket’s public RPC endpoint for DFK Chain and take advantage of Pocket’s decentralized infrastructure. There are two ways to connect your MetaMask wallet to DFK Chain. Choose whichever method you prefer. Chainlist Navigate to https://chainlist.org/?search=dfk, or go to Chainlist and search for “dfk”. Click the down arrow under DFK Chain to expand the entry. In the row with the URL that begins with htps://avax-dfk.

item.title: Ethereum \(ETH\)
item.description: {% embed url=“https://youtu.be/8ruuz3u2V2E" %} We have created a public Ethereum RPC endpoint with up to 10M requests per day to give people who use Metamask the opportunity to connect to Pocket’s decentralized, censorship-resistant infra. To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for Ethereum mainnet, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write Ethereum Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://eth-rpc.

item.title: Evmos

To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for Evmos, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write Evmos Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://evmos-testnet.

To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for Fuse, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write Fuse Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://fuse-rpc.

To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for xDAI, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write Gnosis Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://gnosischain-rpc.

item.title: Harmony
IoTeX
item.description: {% embed url=“https://youtu.be/XXzlplnOR7M" %} We have minted a public IoTeX RPC endpoint with up to 1M requests per day to give people who use Metamask the opportunity to connect to Pocket’s decentralized, censorship-resistant infra. To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for IoTeX, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write IoTeX Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://iotex-mainnet.

item.title: Polygon
item.description: {% embed url=“https://youtu.be/C0jDq20pBYQ" %} We have created a public Polygon RPC endpoint with up to 5M requests per day to give people who use Metamask the opportunity to connect to Pocket’s decentralized, censorship-resistant infra. More details here: https://forum.matic.network/t/pocket-network-creates-free-polygon-rpc-community-endpoints/1597 To get started connecting to Pocket’s infrastructure for Polygon, do the following: Click on the Networks drop-down menu, then press Custom RPC Under the Network Name field, write Polygon Pocket Portal Within the New RPC URL field, copy and paste this endpoint URL https://poly-rpc.
